title: Chancellor of Austria - Wikipedia
snippet: The official residence and executive ... the cabinet are appointed by the president and can be dismissed by the president. The current officeholder is Christian Stocker, who was sworn in as chancellor on 3 March 2025 by President Alexander Van der Bellen....

title: Alexander Van der Bellen - Wikipedia
snippet: After the Nehammer-led coalition talks collapsed, however, Van der Bellen reversed course and asked Herbert Kickl to attempt to form a coalition government with the People's Party on 5 January 2025. Since August 2014 Van der Bellen has already been regarded as a presidential candidate.

title: Austrian far-right leader receives mandate to try to lead a government for the first time since World War II | PBS News
snippet: Left: FILE PHOTO: Austrian President Alexander Van der Bellen shakes hands with far-right Freedom Party (FPO) leader Herbert Kickl in Vienna, Austria, January 6, 2025.

title: 2024 Austrian legislative election - Wikipedia
snippet: It was reported that the Green ... new elections could be called. On 4 January, after consultations with President Van der Bellen, ÖVP and SPÖ continued coalition talks without any other party....
